mapper.update: update student set password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, college = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ifchecked = #{ifchecked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teamid = #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, password, name, intro, age, college, phone, ifchecked, teamid from student
